hints.content:
When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Hundred Thousands | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: | :-: 
$15{,}000$| |$\swarrow\goldD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{5}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$15{,}000 \times 10$ | $?$ | $?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Hundred Thousands | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: | :-: 
$15{,}000$| |$\swarrow\goldD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{5}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$15{,}000 \times 10$ |$\swarrow\goldD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{5}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$ | $0$
